resources.string:
You have no plants yet, or you need to syncronize your phone.

 (1) Start by adding a plant to an existing site (MENU > Add Plant). 

 (2) Please synchronize your phone with the database (Menu > Sync). If this fails, you may have connectivity problems.

You need to synchronize your phone with Project Budburst database.

 (1) Please click Sync button. You can find Sync button at any page by clicking MENU button.


(2) Add a plant to an existing site. (MENU > ADD > Add Plant). Click one of plants in plant list and submit your observation.
You have unsubmitted data. Do you want to submit it?
